title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Skills: Personalized Learning Using Mobile Marketing Educational Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic marketing concepts and experience with digital platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the marketing campaign design process in three or more stages using interactive tools in mobile applications.
Using in-app analytics tools, learners can classify target customer segments in two or more ways and develop data-driven strategies.
Through collaborative features, learners can revise and improve drafts of mobile marketing content at least twice based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
